mapper.select: SELECT u_id AS username, PASSWORD, NAME, DATETIME, isAccountNonExpired, isAccountNonLocked, isCredentialsNonExpired, isEnabled, oauth from user where 1=1 and u_id = #{username}
select u_auth from u_auth where 1=1 and u_id = #{username}
mapper.insert: insert into user ( u_id, password, name, isAccountNonExpired, isAccountNonLocked, isCredentialsNonExpired, isEnabled, oauth, auth, phone, address ) values ( #{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{isAccountNonExpired}, #{isAccountNonLocked}, #{isCredentialsNonExpired}, #{isEnabled}, #{oauth}, #{auth}, #{phone}, #{address} )
mapper.select: SELECT ta.u_id username, ta.name, ta.oauth, tb.u_auth authList, DATETIME, address, phone, POINT, auth, isAccountNonLocked as reject FROM user ta LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ta.u_id, GROUP_CONCAT(ta.u_auth SEPARATOR ",") u_auth FROM u_auth ta GROUP BY ta.u_id ) tb ON ta.u_id = tb.u_id WHERE ta.u_id = #{username}
SELECT u_id as username, name, datetime, oauth, address, phone, point, auth, isAccountNonLocked as reject from user
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wishlist (wishitem, id, option, count) VALUES (#{code}, #{id}, #{option}, #{count})
